Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends provisions relating to the imposition of an occupancy tax on the village of Mount Kisco until September 1, 2027
Summary: Extends provisions relating to the imposition of an occupancy tax on the village of Mount Kisco until September 1, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 511 of the laws of 2016, amending the tax law relating to the imposition of an occupancy tax on the village of Mount Kisco, in relation to extending the provisions of such chapter
